definition: so as not to/so as to avoid
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
old variant of 絻[wen4]
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: When you've fastened the boards, tie the strings off so that they don't slip.
sentences.chinese: 木板钉牢后，把绳子打结系紧，免得松脱。

sentences.english: Think it over before you go so that you won't regret it later.
sentences.chinese: 你要先考虑清楚，免得吃后悔药。

sentences.english: Pack the clothes carefully so that you don't crease them.
sentences.chinese: 把衣服细心装好，免得弄皱了。

sentences.english: So be slow to take action or to make statements you might later regret...
sentences.chinese: 因此，别急着采取行动，或发表声明，免得日后后悔。

sentences.english: Each case is lined with cream artificials in adjustment to assure the goods adjoin columnist.
sentences.chinese: 箱子里垫有泡沫塑料免得货物受压。

sentences.english: I pass over many other things peculiar to this island, lest I should weary you.
sentences.chinese: 我略过这个岛上很多奇怪的事情，免得我让你厌烦。

sentences.english: A stich in time saves embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 及时缝一针，免得再走光。

sentences.english: The light was failing, and he needed to return to camp before his colleagues started to worry.
sentences.chinese: 天暗了下来，他得先赶回营地，免得同事着急。

sentences.english: Well send teams to avoid, or would delay your school.
sentences.chinese: 免得派队嘛，不然会耽误你上学的。

sentences.english: He scrambled widely to pick up the broken glasses before his guests could see them.
sentences.chinese: 他手忙脚乱地去拣摔坏了的眼镜片，免得让客人看见。

sentences.english: Understand the technology before adding their own, so a waste of our time.
sentences.chinese: 自己懂技术的才加，免得浪费大家的时间。

sentences.english: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.
sentences.chinese: 总要儆醒祷告，免得入了迷惑。

sentences.english: Cover the food with a bowl to keep it from getting cold.
sentences.chinese: 用碗把菜扣上，免得凉了。

sentences.english: That the hypocrite reign not, lest the people be ensnared.
sentences.chinese: 别让不敬虔的人作王，免得他危害人民。

sentences.english: Fathers, provoke not your children to indignation, lest they be discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 作父母的，不要激怒你们的子女，免得他们灰心丧志。

sentences.english: When you ride in the street you must look about(you) lest you bump into someone.
sentences.chinese: 在街上骑车，你必须留神四顾，免得撞着别人。

definition: to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
otherwise/or else/or
to fear/afraid/extremely nervous/for fear that/to avoid/so as not to
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
not so/no/or else/otherwise/if not/How about ...?
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
for fear that/lest/also written 惟恐
(coll.) maybe/perhaps
surname Pa
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
unlikely to go so far as to/not as bad as
to be careful/to take care
you might as well (do it)/simply/just
a new branch grows out of a knot (idiom); fig. side issues keep arising
to take care/to look out
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
otherwise/or else/how about...?/either... (or...)
